casebody.data:
ADOLPH E. FLAMANT, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. S. W. WOOD, Defendant and Respondent.

Before Curtis, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Decided March 3, 1879. Appeal from order denying plaintiff’s motion for leave to amend the complaint. W. D. Hennen, for appellants. E. J. Pattison, for respondents. Per Curiam.

The order should be affirmed,, with costs.'
